trans-unit.source: Represents the digitizer device of a Tablet PC.
trans-unit.target: Representa o dispositivo digitalizador de um Tablet.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to get the properties that a <xref:System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice> supports.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como obter as propriedades que um <xref:System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice> oferece suporte.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" /> that reports current input for the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" /> que relata a entrada atual para o dispositivo de tablet.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" /> that reports current input for the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" /> relatórios entrada atual para o dispositivo de tablet.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice.ActiveSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice.ActiveSource%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Required for applications to read this property.
trans-unit.target: Necessário para aplicativos ler esta propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the unique identifier for the tablet device on the system.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o identificador exclusivo do dispositivo de tablet no sistema.

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier for the tablet device on the system.
trans-unit.target: O identificador exclusivo para o dispositivo de tablet no sistema.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice.Id%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice.Id%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do dispositivo de tablet.

trans-unit.source: The name of the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: O nome do dispositivo tablet.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice.Name%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the product identifier for the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o identificador de produto do dispositivo de tablet.

trans-unit.source: The product identifier for the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de produto para o dispositivo de tablet.

trans-unit.source: The manufacturer of the tablet device is responsible for adding this string.
trans-unit.target: O fabricante do dispositivo tablet é responsável por adicionar essa cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: The return value is empty if the tablet device does not have an identifier.
trans-unit.target: O valor de retorno é vazio se o dispositivo de tablet não tem um identificador.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice.ProductId%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice.ProductId%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusDeviceCollection" /> associated with the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusDeviceCollection" /> associado ao dispositivo de tablet.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusDeviceCollection" /> associated with the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusDeviceCollection" /> associado ao dispositivo de tablet.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice.StylusDevices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice.StylusDevices%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> objects that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice" /> supports.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> compatíveis com o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> objects that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice" /> supports.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> objetos que o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice" /> oferece suporte.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to get the properties that a <xref:System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice> supports.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como obter as propriedades que um <xref:System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice> oferece suporte.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TabletHardwareCapabilities" /> for the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TabletHardwareCapabilities" /> do dispositivo de tablet.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TabletHardwareCapabilities" /> for the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TabletHardwareCapabilities" /> para o dispositivo de tablet.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice.TabletHardwareCapabilities%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice.TabletHardwareCapabilities%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.IInputElement" /> that provides basic input processing for the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.IInputElement" /> que fornece processamento de entrada básico para o dispositivo de tablet.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.IInputElement" /> that provides basic input processing for the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.IInputElement" /> que fornece processamento de entrada básico para o dispositivo de tablet.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice.Target%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice.Target%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o nome do dispositivo de tablet.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contém o nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice> método.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TabletDeviceType" /> of the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TabletDeviceType" /> do dispositivo de tablet.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TabletDeviceType" /> of the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TabletDeviceType" /> do dispositivo tablet.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice.Type%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice.Type%2A> propriedade.
